    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205351</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Master Teachers: Ali Akbar Khan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorlagenlehrer: Ali Akbar Khan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Professeurs Principaux : Ali Akbar 
Khan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Professores Mestres: Ali Akbar Khan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnanti Matrici: Ali Akbar Khan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύριοι δάσκαλοι: Ali Akbar Khan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Profesores Principales: Ali Akbar Khan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK visits Ali Akbar Khan, one of the finest musicians of North India in the world as he passes his gift to several generations of musicians at the Ali Akbar Khan College of Music in San Rafael, California. This Educator Guide offers explorations of North Indian Classical Music and culture.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN besucht Ali Akbar Khan, einer der feinsten 
Musiker von Nordindien in der Welt, während er einigen Erzeugungen 
der Musiker sein Geschenk an der Ali Akbar Khan Hochschule von Musik 
in San Rafael, Kalifornien führt. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung 
bietet Erforschungen der indischen klassischen Nordmusik und der 
Kultur an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE rend visite à Ali Akbar 
Khan, un des plus bons musiciens de l'Inde du nord dans le
monde pendant qu'il passe son cadeau à plusieurs générations des 
musiciens à l'université d'Ali Akbar Khan de la 
musique dans San Rafaël, la Californie. Ce guide d'éducateur 
offre des explorations de la musique classique indienne du nord 
et de la culture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA visita Ali Akbar Khan, um dos músicos 
os mais finos de India norte no mundo enquanto passa seu presente a 
diversas gerações dos músicos na faculdade de Ali Akbar Khan da 
música em San Rafael, Califórnia. Esta guia do educador 
oferece explorações da música clássica e da cultura indian nortes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA visita Ali Akbar Khan, uno dei 
musicisti più fini dell'India del nord nel mondo mentre passa il 
suo regalo a parecchie generazioni dei musicisti all'università 
dell'Ali Akbar Khan di musica in San Rafael, la California. 
Questa guida dell'educatore offre le esplorazioni di musica 
classica e di coltura indiane del nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επισκέψεις ali Akbar Khan, ένας ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΩΝ από 
τους λεπτότερους μουσικούς της βόρειας Ινδίας στον κόσμο καθώς 
περνά το δώρο του σε διάφορες γενεές των μουσικών στο ali 
Akbar Khan κολλέγιο της μουσικής στο SAN rafael, 
Καλιφόρνια. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών προσφέρει τις 
εξερευνήσεις της βόρειας ινδικής κλασσικής μουσικής και τον 
πολιτισμό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA visita a Ali Akbar Khan, uno de los 
músicos más finos de la India del norte en el mundo mientras que él
pasa su regalo a varias generaciones de músicos en la universidad de 
Ali Akbar Khan de la música en San Rafael, California. Esta 
guía del educador ofrece exploraciones de la música clásica y de la
cultura indias del norte.</string>
          </description>
